00041 void tmrm_storage_register_factory(tmrm_subject_map_sphere *sms,
00042         const char* name, const char* label,
00043         void (*factory)(tmrm_storage_factory*));
00044 
00046 struct tmrm_storage_s
00047 {
00048     tmrm_subject_map_sphere* subject_map_sphere;
00049     struct tmrm_storage_factory_s* factory;
00050     void *context;
00051 };
00052 
00053 struct tmrm_storage_factory_s {
00054     char* name;
00055     char* label;
00056 
00057     /* the rest of this structure is populated by the
00058      *      storage-specific register function */
00059     size_t context_length;
00060 
00061     /* Contructor */
00062     int (*init)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_hash* options);
00063     /* Destructor */
00064     void (*free)(tmrm_storage* storage);
00065 
00066     int (*bootstrap)(tmrm_storage* s, tmrm_subject_map* map);
00067     int (*remove)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_subject_map* map);
00068 
00069     tmrm_proxy* (*bottom)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_subject_map* map);
00070     int (*merge)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_subject_map* map);
00071 
00072     tmrm_proxy* (*proxy_create)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_subject_map* map);
00073     int (*proxy_update)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p);
00074     int (*add_property)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p,
00075             tmrm_proxy* key, tmrm_proxy* value);
00076     int (*add_property_literal)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p, 
00077             tmrm_proxy* key, tmrm_literal* value);
00078     tmrm_proxy* (*proxy_by_label)(tmrm_storage* storage, 
00079         tmrm_subject_map* map, const char* label);
00080     tmrm_iterator* (*proxies)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_subject_map* map);
00081     char* (*proxy_label)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p);
00082     tmrm_iterator* (*proxy_keys)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p);
00083     tmrm_iterator* (*proxy_values_by_key)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p,
00084             tmrm_proxy* key);
00085     tmrm_iterator* (*proxy_is_value_by_key)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p,
00086             tmrm_proxy* key);

00088             tmrm_literal* lit, tmrm_proxy* key);

00099     tmrm_iterator* (*proxy_direct_types)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p);
00100     tmrm_iterator* (*proxy_direct_instances)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p);

00102             tmrm_proxy* key);
00103     tmrm_iterator* (*proxy_properties)(tmrm_storage* storage, tmrm_proxy* p);
